Title: Relates to pet dealers, brokers and retail pet shops; repealer
Summary: Amends the definitions of pet dealers, brokers and retail pet shops.
LawCode: Rpld §752 sub 3, amd §§752 & 753-f, Gen Bus L; amd §400, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to pet dealers; and to repeal certain provisions of the general business law relating thereto
